3.1

  • Merge article & readability tabs, with option to toggle between 2 modes
  • Improve article display:
    Rotate device without refreshing page
    Remember scroll position in fullscreen
  • Customize swipe actions: vote/refresh/save story
  • Remember on-screen D-Pad position, option to turn off vibration
  • Enable lazy loading for all connections
  • Android N featuresnew!: multi-window support, app shortcuts
  • Many other fixes and improvements based on your feedback
If you encounter issues, please send me details via feedback dialog.
